name: mmlasso
tagline: R Package to calculate the MM-Lasso and adaptive MM-Lasso estimators proposed in Smucler and Yohai (2015).
body:
This is the GitHub repository for the R package "mmlasso" written by Ezequiel Smucler (@esmucler). This package provides functions to calculate the MM-Lasso and adaptive MM-Lasso estimators proposed in Smucler and Yohai (2015).


**References**

Robust and Sparse Estimators for Linear Regression Models, Smucler and Yohai (2015). [Available here.](http://arxiv.org/abs/1508.01967)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
